resources.string: Scanning Bluetooth device needs to open the location function permission.
The location service is not enabled
Please turn on the Bluetooth of your phone, otherwise you cannot connect the thermometer.
This device has been paired already. Please release it first.
Permission to get your position is needed for your device to connect to your phone. Please allow for it in the phone settings.
This device has been paired already. Please release it first.
Server connection error. Please try later.
please choose the right device type to bind!
you can search and connect thermometer equipment.
Your device program is not up to date, please click "OK" to update the device program!
In order to ensure a good Bluetooth connection, please always keep the pregnant orange displayed on the screen, please do not turn off the device
Device connected, checking the latest firmware version...
Check firmware version failed, please check your network!
Found your firmware version is :%s, which OAD is not supported!
Found newer firmware version: %s, download to update!
The current firmware is already the latest version!
Time in total: %d sec, left %1$d sec
Checking if OAD is successful, please wait...
Checking if OAD is successful, please restart device...
Continue to add your body temperature
2)Make sure the smart basal \nthermometer is not on History Mode
Data check completed. No new BBT data. Measure your temperature now.
The beep indicates your temperature is taken successfully. Do not turn off the tracker immediately after the measurement in case of data loss.\n
BBT data transferred. %d data synchronized. Let’s keep measuring your BBT every day.
BBT data transferred. %d data updated. Let’s keep measuring.
<font color="#FF6F8F">Notice:</font>It\'s best to measure BBT before your get out of bed every morning. Please try to measure it at the same time every day.
BBT data transferred. %d data updated. No BBT data for today. The best time to measure BBT is after you wake up and before you get out of bed in the morning. Don’t forget to measure your BBT today.
BBT data transferred. %d data updated. No BBT data for today. The best time to measure BBT is after you wake up and before you get out of bed in the morning. Let’s measure the temperature now.
BBT data transferred. %d data updated. No BBT data for today. Let’s measure the temperature now.
<font color="#FF6F8F">Notice:</font>It\'s best to measure BBT before your get out of bed every morning. Please try to measure it at the same time every day.
%d BBT data received. Don’t forget to check the BBT curve.
Shecare fails to save your temperature %s%s. Body temperature should be %s-%s%s.
To ensure the Bluetooth connection, always keep Shecare on the screen and do not turn off the device.
Temperature reading too high. Please take your temperature again.
You received multiple new temperatures! see detail in App
, temperature and test paper is more accurate！
Don’t have a Shecare smart basal thermometer yet?
Shecare smart basal thermometer collects women\'s basal body temperature (BBT). Your BBT data will be represented automatically in graphs and stored permanently.
Buy now and get a free conception prep course.
